title: Swipe from corner to launch Google Assistant bug
content: I have discovered a bug recently where when I swipe from the corner to launch Google Assistant it will never launch correctly first time, instead of coming up with the rainbow type colours and "Hi how can I help?" It just comes up with the rainbow effect, it takes 2 attempts at swiping from the corner to get it launch correctly and listen to me
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
